tours.title: Island Adventure
tours.description: Explore the beautiful islands with crystal clear waters and sandy beaches.

tours.title: Safari Expedition
tours.description: Experience wildlife up close in the vast savannah of Kenya.

tours.title: Cultural Tour
tours.description: Discover historical sites, art, and cuisine in various Italian cities.

tours.title: Mountain Hiking
tours.description: Challenge yourself with breathtaking hikes in the Swiss Alps.

tours.title: Desert Safari
tours.description: Enjoy dune bashing and sunset views in the Arabian desert.

tours.title: Rainforest Retreat
tours.description: Immerse yourself in nature with guided rainforest tours and wildlife spotting.

tours.title: City Escape
tours.description: Experience the vibrant city life with tours of iconic landmarks and neighborhoods.

tours.title: Historical Journey
tours.description: Visit ancient ruins and enjoy the Aegean culture with expert guides.

tours.title: Coastal Cruise
tours.description: Sail the Caribbean seas and explore multiple tropical islands.

tours.title: Winter Wonderland
tours.description: Enjoy ski resorts and snowy landscapes in Canada's winter paradise.
